author: Silver Cymbal
description:
I thought it was impossible to use a PTO driven tractor attachment on my Bobcat Toolcat with a Skdi Steer mount. See how I adapted a bug sprayer to be used on my tractor that can now do leaf blowing as well. I am sharign this solution as I couldn't find anyone that showed how to use a PTO driven adapter on a Skid Steer. This ETerra mount works amazing.

PTO Skid Steer Eterra Adapter I used: https://www.skidsteersolutions.com/motorized-high-flow-skid-steer-3-point-adapter-eterra/
Skid Steer Solutions  https://www.skidsteersolutions.com/
These guys are fantastic and have been doing Skid Steer products for over 20 years!

This video, description and comments contain affiliate links, which means that if you click on one of the product links, I’ll receive a small commission. This helps support the channel and allows us to continue to make videos like this. Thank you for the support!

title: How to Use 3 Point Tractor Implements on a Skid Steer Mount with PTO
